conversations.content: What programming languages did the person work with at NAB Capital?
The person worked with #Python, #Java, and #Powershell at NAB Capital.
What were the roles of this person at NAB Capital?

The person held the role of Solutions Lead in various roles, including Wholesale, at NAB Capital. Their achievements included automation and cash flow reconciliation for successful upgrade/integration testing utilising IBM MQ and Tibco EMS.
What other roles did the person have outside of NAB Capital?

The person also worked as a Consultant at the Securities Industry Research Center of Asia Pacific (SIRCA), an Automation Lead at E*Trade Australia, a Senior Test Analyst at IRESS, a QA Engineer at ATEX Media, a Developer at Vermont Technology, and possibly other roles not specified.
What specific achievements does the person mention in the paragraph related to data science?

The achievements mentioned in the paragraph that are related to data science include 'Established data science', 'Developed E2E analytics ingestion and modelling', 'Feature engineering for Financial Crime' and 'Developed R Shiny tool modelling'.
Can you explain what 'data industrialisation' refers to in this context?
In the given paragraph, 'data industrialisation' seems to refer to applying data-driven strategies and processes at a large scale within an organization or industry.
What does 'EMSBR supervised clustering upcoming trends' signify?

In the given context, it appears that 'EMSBR supervised clustering upcoming trends' refers to using supervised learning techniques for clustering data to identify emerging patterns or trends in a dataset.
Can you explain what Watson Studio is used for in this context?

In this context, Watson Studio is the business owner's analytics platform. It provides ongoing direction for developing data industrialization functions using both R and Python. This includes tasks from data preparation to monitoring and calibration, aligning with BCBS 239 requirements.
What techniques are being used in the significant breach reporting project?
The significant breach reporting project utilizes semi-supervised and classification (specifically logistic regression) techniques to identify risk events and complaints.
What is the purpose of the customer vulnerability detection program?

The customer vulnerability detection program aims to detect vulnerable customers. It does this by using Natural Language Processing (NLP) on customers who send or receive abusive content, and then identifies high-risk customer groups using unsupervised clustering. Logistic regression and random forest are used for feature grid search for clustering.
What does the paragraph suggest about the AI-based solutions?

The paragraph suggests that AI-based solutions are being used by executive teams of various sizes and structures, both onshore and offshore, in collaboration with vendors like Microsoft, Google, and Experian. These solutions are aimed at improving strategy and producing efficient outcomes.
Who are the mentioned collaborators for these AI-based solutions?
The collaborators mentioned in the paragraph are Microsoft, Google, and Experian.
In what ways are these AI-based solutions helping executive teams?
The paragraph suggests that these AI-based solutions help executive teams by improving their strategy and producing efficient outcomes.
What are the main domains that this text is about?
The main domains mentioned in the text are Comprehensive Model Monitoring, Model Validation Automation, Framework Ops Risk Scenario Analysis, COVID workforce impact, Internal Identification.
Who is the intended audience for these domains?
The intended audiences for these domains are Group and Divisional Chief Risk Officers (CROs), Risk committees, and HR committees.
What platforms are mentioned in relation to the above domains?
The text mentions owned data and analytics platforms in relation to the above domains.
What is the main focus of the person mentioned in the paragraph?
The main focus of the person mentioned in the paragraph has been on building business and technology teams.
Why are these business and technology teams important according to the text?
According to the text, building business and technology teams has been critical for multiple regulatory projects.
What kind of projects have these teams been involved in?
The text doesn't specify the exact nature of the projects, but it mentions that they are regulatory projects.
Can you explain what NLP algorithms are mentioned in the paragraph?
The NLP algorithms mentioned in the paragraph are word embedding and topical models. These algorithms are used in Natural Language Processing (NLP) for understanding human language.
What deep learning models are mentioned in the paragraph?

The deep learning models mentioned in the paragraph are DNN (Deep Neural Network), CNN (Convolutional Neural Network), RNN (Recurrent Neural Network) with specific types LSTM (Long Short-Term Memory) and GRU (Gated Recurrent Unit).
What programming languages are mentioned in the paragraph, and what are they primarily used for?
The programming languages mentioned in the paragraph are Python and R. Python is primarily used for data wrangling, machine learning models, and web-services. R is primarily used for data wrangling.
What is the name and job title of the person who lives at 12 Reserve Avenue, Mitcham?
The person's name is not specified in the text, but their job title is Anthony Senior Manager in Data Science.
What kind of expertise does Anthony have?
Anthony has expertise in data engineering, particularly with banking products and defining risk strategies.
Is Anthony an expert in any specific field of data science?
Yes, the text suggests that Anthony is a hands-on senior domain knowledge expert in data engineering.
What is the main focus of the lead platform designer's role in this context?
The main focus of the lead platform designer's role in this context seems to be developing and implementing various strategies, systems, and tools related to lending and credit analytics.
Can you list some specific achievements of the lead platform designer?

Some specific achievements of the lead platform designer include implementing automated decisions for secured lending portfolios, developing a high-performing system for manual override, creating a framework to simulate lending performance, delivering credit analytics decisions in real-time, and optimizing LVR allocation for the secured requirement.
What tools or technologies have been used by the lead platform designer?

The lead platform designer has used various tools and technologies such as SAS DI, Python, Spark, Decision Tree, Logistic Regression, QlikView, and pySpark for automating tasks like PDF document processing.
Can you tell me about the high-profile projects you've led?

I have led and accomplished numerous high-profile projects. These include Credit Reporting, Retail Lending Strategy with Multiple Intelligence Hub, Bank Internal Bureau, Single Customer View, Monitoring, Dynamic LVR optimisation, Pre-delinquent Lending (RG209) Fraud Clustering, NetReveal Case Management Abuse Strategy.
What specific knowledge did you use in these projects?
I used my knowledge in machine learning and data for these projects.
Can you provide more details about the 'Pre-delinquent Lending (RG209) Fraud Clustering' project?

'Pre-delinquent Lending (RG209) Fraud Clustering' was a project in which I used machine learning and data analysis techniques to identify potential fraud cases before they became delinquent. This helped the bank to take proactive measures to mitigate risk.
What projects has the team completed so far?
The team has completed ECL, APS220, and Credit Risk Model Monitoring.
What tools does the team use for data engineering?
The team uses R Studio, Python, Shiny, SAS, and IBM analytics capabilities.
Who does the HO GROUP COMPLIANCE lead in terms of teams?
The HO GROUP COMPLIANCE leads teams of talented data engineers.
What was the name of the key decision vendor selection program mentioned in the text?
The key decision vendor selection program mentioned in the text is not explicitly specified, but it is known that PowerCurve was one of the vendors involved.
What was the role the author had in the credit decision project they mentioned?

The author led the design and delivery of the credit decision project, specifically for Experian's PowerCurve Originations. They replaced a legacy mainframe-based decision system with a new PowerCurve-based strategy.
What were some components of the new credit decision strategy mentioned in the text?

The new credit decision strategy included support for credit cards, personal loans, home loans and other secured/non-secured loans. It also integrated with credit bureaus, had a decision workflow for automated simulation using historical applications and analyzing new acquisition strategies. Additionally, it featured a database for credit risk monitoring and analysis.
What is the educational background of this individual?
The individual has a Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering (Honors) from RMIT University and is currently pursuing a PhD at the University Of Melbourne.
What are the specific areas of skill this individual possesses?
The individual has skills in various statistical models such as Linear/logistic regression, SVM, Decision Trees, DB scan, K-means, etc.
What is the current project this individual is working on?
The current project this individual is working on is Automated Compliance Checks with Generative AI.
What is the field of study that the text mentions?
The text mentions the field of study as Data Science and Artificial Intelligence (AI).
Can you explain what 'comprehensive understanding of data' means in this context?

In this context, a 'comprehensive understanding of data' means that the person has a broad and deep knowledge about various aspects of data, such as data collection, data cleaning, data analysis, and data interpretation.
Does this text imply that the person is skilled in both Data Science and AI?
Yes, the text implies that the person has skills in both Data Science and Artificial Intelligence.
What was the original time taken for the calculation of DLVR?
The original time taken for the calculation of DLVR was 7 days.
How did you manage to reduce the time taken for the calculation of DLVR from 7 days to 5 minutes?
The reduction in time was achieved by utilizing Python, sci-pi, and parallel processing. Additionally, SMOTE and Experianâ€™s PowerCurve Strategy rules were implemented.
What tools or platforms were used for handling complex data and unstructured data?
Complex data and unstructured data were handled using big data platforms such as ab initio and Cloudera.
Can you tell me about some of the projects you have led?

Sure! Some projects I've led include Credit Risk: Comprehensive Bureau Data, Property Credit Decision Realtime Modelling, Responsible Financial Crime: Application Optimisation, Transaction Compliance: BASEL 3, Banking Executive Accountability Operational Risk: CPS220, and Fraud Systemic Issues.
Where have you worked in your professional career?
I've had the pleasure of working with CoreLogic, IBM, and PWC. I also have a strong presence within the technical risk community.
What is your daily role and responsibilities?

My daily role involves providing actionable insights, consultation, managing teams, and ensuring continuous and effective business data platforms. Beyond the technical aspects, I also design architectures and maintain strong relationships for successful execution.
What programming languages and tools have been mentioned in the text?

The paragraph mentions R, Python, SQL, J2EE, JMS, Tibco MQ, and the data visualization libraries R-shiny, ggplot, hi-chart, plot.ly, seaborn, python dash, QlikView, QlikSense, Power BI, SSRS, SAS, and the big data platform Spark.
What are some of the roles and skills mentioned in the text?

The text mentions experience in multiple modelling, business impact optimisation, data visualization, data processing, development, test automation, project management, management of multiple teams across different geographies, recruitment, budgeting, performance. Skills also include SQL, SAS, Teradata, Spark, Ab initio, big data platform such as Cloudera, J2EE, JMS, Tibco MQ.
In what field and for which organization did the person work from 2018-2022?
The person worked in Data Science & Industrialisation and Fin Crime at ANZ from 2018-2022.
What was the role you held at Westpac between 2022 and 2024?
You held the role of Principal Solution Designer for Credit Risk.
What was one of your main responsibilities during this period?
One of your main responsibilities was leading a team of data solution designers to provide data solutions for risk data platforms.
In what time frame did you hold this role at Westpac?
You held this role between the years 2022 and 2024.
